name: openhab-persistence-export
description: A web-based wizard for exporting openHAB persistence data.

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p vendor/css vendor/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css vendor/css/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js vendor/js/ && cp node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.css vendor/css/ && cp node_modules/flatpickr/dist/flatpickr.min.js vendor/js/

author: Florian Hotze
